snippet: Officials in Yunnan Province have apologized for rapidly cremating the remains of 46 landslide victims without first consulting relatives, state news media reported Tuesday.
abstract: Officials in Yunnan Province, China, apologize for rapidly cremating remains of 46 landslide victims without first consulting their relatives.
lead_paragraph: Officials in Yunnan Province have apologized for rapidly cremating the remains of 46 landslide victims without first consulting relatives, state news media reported Tuesday.

headline.seo: China: Officials Apologize to Families for Cremation of Landslide Victims
headline.main: China: Officials Apologize to Families for Cremation of Landslide Victims
headline.print_headline: China: Officials Apologize to Families For Cremation of Landslide Victims
